title: LEASE TO OWN HOMES
posting_body: This tri-level home has it all!
Upon entering, you’ll enjoy an open living area with wall-mounted electric fireplace!
Plus, there’s the kitchen with lots of cabinet space and all appliances are included!
Walk down a few steps to the lower level into the cozy family room with gas fireplace for those cool Colorado evenings!
Enjoy the large, newly landscaped backyard with a big concrete patio – perfect for entertaining and relaxing!
There’s a two-car attached garage, roof is only three years old and radon system in basement!
**  Due to HIGH demand of this GREAT program, subject homes may be unavailable upon resident approval
